ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And We rescued those who had iman and taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But We saved those who believed and took heed for themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Yet We delivered those who believed and were God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We only rescued the believers who had fear of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We rescued those who accepted faith and were pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We saved those who believed and had Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We delivered those who believed and guarded (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We delivered those who believed and were godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We delivered those who believed and used to keep their duty to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We saved those who had attained to faith and were God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We delivered those who believed and had been fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And We delivered those who had faith and were Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But We delivered those who believed and practised righteousness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah, keep their duty to Him and avoid evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We saved those who believed and feared Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We saved those who believed and were righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [41:18] And We delivered, from it, those who believed and feared, God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We delivered those who believed) in Salih (and used to keep their duty to Allah) and used to ward off disbelief, idolatry and hamstringing the camel.
